TEXT.English: %D1: "We feel threatened by your large civilization."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "We feel threatened by your large civilization."

TEXT.English: %D1: "A first impression is a lasting one."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "A first impression is a lasting one."

TEXT.English: %D1: "Developing nations should work together to catch up."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "Developing nations should work together to catch up."

TEXT.English: %D1: "The war is going badly for us."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "The war is going badly for us."

TEXT.English: %D1: "Your small civilization is no threat to us."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "Your small civilization is no threat to us."
